00024 using System.Text;

00027 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.XMDP
00028 {
00032     public class XMDP
00033     {
00034         #region Constructor
00035 
00039         public XMDP()
00040         {
00041             Properties = new List<Property>();
00042         }
00043 
00044         #endregion
00045 
00046         #region Properties
00047 
00051         public List<Property> Properties{get;set;}
00052 
00053         #endregion
00054 
00055         #region Overridden Functions
00056 
00057         public override string ToString()
00058         {
00059             try
00060             {
00061                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00062                 Builder.Append("<dl class=\"profile\">");
00063                 foreach (Property Property in Properties)
00064                 {
00065                     Builder.Append(Property.ToString());
00066                 }
00067                 Builder.Append("</dl>");
00068                 return Builder.ToString();
00069             }
00070             catch { throw; }
00071         }
00072 
00073         #endregion
00074     }
00075 }
